summary: An ordinance relating to and authorizing the sale to Geo. H. Burr, Conrad & Broom, Inc., of $1,500,000.00 Municipal Light and Power Bonds, authorized by Ordinance No. 45058, as amended by Ordinance No. 46406, prescribing the interest rate thereon, maturity dates, denominations and series designation thereof, and repealing all ordinances and parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
